name: Settler
uniques: Founds a new city <by consuming this unit>
Excess Food converted to Production when under construction

name: Scout
uniques: May upgrade to [Slugthrower] through ruins-like effects
Never appears as a Barbarian unit

name: Work Boats
uniques: May create improvements on water resources

name: Warrior
uniques: May upgrade to [Beam-tuber] through ruins-like effects

civilopediaText.text: This is your basic, club-swinging fighter.

name: Rakata Warrior
uniques: May upgrade to [Beam-tuber] through ruins-like effects

civilopediaText.text: Long ago the Rakata ruled all the known galaxy; all species bowed down to them - Keeper Orsaa

name: Sith Pureblood Warrior
uniques: May upgrade to [Beam-tuber] through ruins-like effects

civilopediaText.text: The term Sith actually refers to a species of red-skinned beings who were native to Korriban. - Vestara Khai
It's like a projectile from a slugthrower. Like someone whipped a rock real fast. - Joss Adren

name: Star Lancer
uniques: Never appears as a Barbarian unit

civilopediaText.text: In the light, there is a darkness and in the darkness, a light. It is the way with us all. Be a prisoner of neither Bogan nor Ashla. Strive to live in balance. As Tython itself teaches us, it is dangerous to do otherwise. And the danger is thereâ€”always. - Ketu
I am as I was made. Born to be a Force Hound. Fated to serve my masters. - Xesh
That's not a star cruiser. That's a horse. Horses don't fly. - Cindel Towani

name: Ancient Artillery
uniques: Must set up to ranged attack
Never appears as a Barbarian unit

civilopediaText.text: ...and I've always said, if Exar Kun had artillery at Toprawa, your Jedi Chancellor would be sporting yellow eyes today. - Jarrow Rusher

name: Ancient Starship
uniques: Never appears as a Barbarian unit

civilopediaText.text: From the earliest atomic rockets with primitive laser armaments, to Expansion Era cruisers such as the Gilagimar, to the Republic's battle vessels, to the amazing Super Star Destroyers of the Empire, ships have traded fire in the depths of space. - Unknown

name: Great Artist
uniques: Empire enters a [8]-turn Golden Age <by consuming this unit>
Can instantly construct a [Landmark] improvement <by consuming this unit>

name: Great Scientist
uniques: Can instantly construct a [Academy] improvement <by consuming this unit>

name: Great Merchant
uniques: Can undertake a trade mission with City-State, giving a large sum of gold and [30] Influence
Can instantly construct a [Customs house] improvement <by consuming this unit>

name: Great Engineer
uniques: Can speed up construction of a building
Can instantly construct a [Manufactory] improvement <by consuming this unit>

name: Great Prophet
uniques: Can instantly construct a [Holy site] improvement <by consuming this unit> <if it hasn't used other actions yet>
Can Spread Religion <for [2] movement> <[4] times> <after which this unit is consumed>
Removes other religions when spreading religion
May found a religion <by consuming this unit> <if it hasn't used other actions yet>
May enhance a religion <by consuming this unit>  <if it hasn't used other actions yet>
May enter foreign tiles without open borders
Takes your religion over the one in their birth city

name: Great General
uniques: Empire enters a [8]-turn Golden Age <by consuming this unit>
[+15]% Strength bonus for [Military] units within [2] tiles
Can instantly construct a [Citadel] improvement <by consuming this unit>
